title: RAK12039 WisBlock Particle Matter Sensor Module Datasheet > RAK12039 WisBlock Particle Matter Sensor Module Datasheet > Overview > Description > RAK12039 Particle Matter Sensor Module Overview
content: The RAK12039 is a Particle Matter Sensor module that is part of the RAKWireless WisBlock Sensor series. It is based on PMSA003I digital particle concentration sensor, which obtains the number of suspended particles in the air. It is interfaced via I2C bus and allows you to capture standard PM1.0, PM2.5, and PM10 values, as well as, a number of particles in micrometer on a 0.1L particle standard volume.
parent_content: The RAK12039 is a Particle Matter Sensor module that is part of the RAKWireless WisBlock Sensor series. It is based on PMSA003I digital particle concentration sensor, which obtains the number of suspended particles in the air. It is interfaced via I2C bus and allows you to capture standard PM1.0, PM2.5, and PM10 values, as well as, a number of particles in micrometer on a 0.1L particle standard volume.

title: RAK12039 WisBlock Particle Matter Sensor Module Datasheet > RAK12039 WisBlock Particle Matter Sensor Module Datasheet > Specifications > Overview > Mounting > RAK12039 WisBlock Particle Matter Sensor Module Mounting
content:
The RAK12039 WisBlock Particle Matter Sensor Module can be mounted to the IO slot of the [WisBlock Base](https://docs.rakwireless.com/product-categories/wisblock#wisblock-base) board. **Figure 3** shows the mounting mechanism of the RAK12039 on a WisBlock Base module.  
> **Image:** RAK12039 WisBlock Particle Matter Sensor mounting
parent_content:
The RAK12039 WisBlock Particle Matter Sensor Module can be mounted to the IO slot of the [WisBlock Base](https://docs.rakwireless.com/product-categories/wisblock#wisblock-base) board. **Figure 3** shows the mounting mechanism of the RAK12039 on a WisBlock Base module.  
> **Image:** RAK12039 WisBlock Particle Matter Sensor mounting

title: RAK12039 WisBlock Particle Matter Sensor Module Datasheet > RAK12039 WisBlock Particle Matter Sensor Module Datasheet > Specifications > Hardware > Chipset > Vendor and Part Number Information [TABLE]

RAK12039 WisBlock Particle Matter Sensor Module Datasheet > RAK12039 WisBlock Particle Matter Sensor Module Datasheet > Specifications > Hardware > Pin Definition > RAK12039 WisBlock Particle Matter Sensor Module Pinout [TABLE]
content:
The RAK12039 WisBlock Particle Matter Sensor Module comprises a standard 40-pin WisConnector. The WisConnector allows the RAK12039 module to be mounted to a WisBlock Base Board. The pin order of the connector and the pinout definition is shown in **Figure 4**.  
> **TIP:** NOTE
**VBAT**, **3V3_S**, **GND**, **I2C** pins, **RESET**, and **SET**  are connected to 40-pin WisConnector.  
> **Image:** RAK12039 WisBlock Particle Matter Sensor pinout
parent_content:
The RAK12039 WisBlock Particle Matter Sensor Module comprises a standard 40-pin WisConnector. The WisConnector allows the RAK12039 module to be mounted to a WisBlock Base Board. The pin order of the connector and the pinout definition is shown in **Figure 4**.  
> **TIP:** NOTE
**VBAT**, **3V3_S**, **GND**, **I2C** pins, **RESET**, and **SET**  are connected to 40-pin WisConnector.  
> **Image:** RAK12039 WisBlock Particle Matter Sensor pinout

title: RAK12039 WisBlock Particle Matter Sensor Module Datasheet > RAK12039 WisBlock Particle Matter Sensor Module Datasheet > Specifications > Hardware > Mechanical Characteristics > WisConnector PCB Layout > WisConnector PCB Footprint and Recommendations [IMAGE]

RAK12039 WisBlock Particle Matter Sensor Module Datasheet > RAK12039 WisBlock Particle Matter Sensor Module Datasheet > Specifications > Hardware > Schematic Diagram > RAK12039 I2C Address and Resistor Configuration
content:
The I2C address of RAK12039 is 0x12. R10 and R11 do not need to be mounted on the RAK12039 due to the pull-up resistors already on the WisBlock Base board.  
> **Image:** RAK12039 schematic diagram
parent_content:
The I2C address of RAK12039 is 0x12. R10 and R11 do not need to be mounted on the RAK12039 due to the pull-up resistors already on the WisBlock Base board.  
> **Image:** RAK12039 schematic diagram

title: RAK12039 WisBlock Particle Matter Sensor Module Datasheet > RAK12039 WisBlock Particle Matter Sensor Module Datasheet > Specifications > Hardware > PMSA003I Installation Notes > Installation Guidelines for RAK12039 Sensor
content:
1) Metal shell is connected to the GND, so be careful not to let it get shorted with the other parts of the circuit.
2) The best way of installation is to make the plane of the inlet and outlet close to the plane of the host. Or some shield should be placed between the inlet and outlet to prevent the airflow from the inner loop.
3) The blowhole in the shell of the host should not be smaller than the inlet.
parent_content:
1) Metal shell is connected to the GND, so be careful not to let it get shorted with the other parts of the circuit.
2) The best way of installation is to make the plane of the inlet and outlet close to the plane of the host. Or some shield should be placed between the inlet and outlet to prevent the airflow from the inner loop.
3) The blowhole in the shell of the host should not be smaller than the inlet.
4) The sensor should not be installed in the airflow way of the air cleaner or should be shielded by some structure.
5) When the sensor is used for outdoor fixed equipment, the equipment should be completed with protection from the sandstorm, rain, snow, etc.
6) The two screw holes can be used for positioning and fixing. For fixing holes, the screw depth can reach 3.4mm, and the other should not exceed 1.9mm.

4) The sensor should not be installed in the airflow way of the air cleaner or should be shielded by some structure.
5) When the sensor is used for outdoor fixed equipment, the equipment should be completed with protection from the sandstorm, rain, snow, etc.
6) The two screw holes can be used for positioning and fixing. For fixing holes, the screw depth can reach 3.4mm, and the other should not exceed 1.9mm.
